content: 12 spaces 5 slip_stitch into next 2 chain single_crochet into first chain 5 space *chain 5 single_crochet into same space chain 5 single_crochet into next space * 11 times join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet 24 spaces 6 - 9 slip_stitch into next 2 chain single_crochet into first chain 5 space *chain 5 single_crochet into next chain 5 space* 23 times join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet 24 spaces 10 chain 5 single_crochet into first space *chain 5 single_crochet into next space chain 5 single_crochet into next space chain 5 single_crochet into same space * 11 times chain 5 single_crochet into next space chain 5 slip_stitch into first single_crochet 36 spaces body chain 5 single_crochet into next space pm into the space you just made *chain 5 single_crochet into next space * repeat around for 24 row using the marker to judge roughly where the rounds begin and end it s not necessary to know precisely where the beginning and end of the rounds are you don t need to move the marker as you work the body unless you prefer to top and finishing 1 chain 4 single_crochet into next space repeat around 2 chain 3 single_crochet into next space repeat around 3 chain 2 single_crochet into next space repeat around 4 chain 20 join to first chain with slip_stitch break yarn with at least 4 tail 5 weave in ends and enjoy
